mapper.select: SELECT t_board_type.i_board_type, type_title, t_board_type.board_hit, i_board, i_user, board_nm, board_ctnt, board_favorite, secret, r_dt FROM t_board_type LEFT JOIN t_board ON t_board_type.i_board_type = t_board.i_board_type GROUP BY t_board_type.i_board_type ORDER BY board_hit DESC;

SELECT a.i_board, a.i_user, a.board_nm, a.board_ctnt, a.board_favorite, a.secret, a.r_dt, a.board_hit, b.i_board_type, b.type_title, (SELECT everyuser.user_nm FROM everyuser WHERE everyuser.i_user = a.i_user) AS user_nm, (SELECT count(t_favorite.i_user) FROM t_favorite WHERE t_favorite.i_board = a.i_board) AS favorite, (SELECT count(board_cmt.i_cmt) FROM board_cmt WHERE a.i_board = board_cmt.i_board) AS cmt FROM t_board a LEFT JOIN t_board_type b ON a.i_board_type = b.i_board_type ORDER BY a.board_hit DESC;

SELECT a.i_board, a.i_board_type, a.i_user, a.board_nm, a.board_ctnt, a.board_favorite, a.secret, a.board_hit, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, a.r_dt, NOW()) AS r_dt, (SELECT everyuser.user_nm FROM everyuser WHERE everyuser.i_user = a.i_user) AS user_nm, (SELECT count(t_favorite.i_user) FROM t_favorite WHERE t_favorite.i_board = a.i_board) AS favorite, (SELECT count(board_cmt.i_cmt) FROM board_cmt WHERE a.i_board = board_cmt.i_board) AS cmt FROM t_board a WHERE i_board_type = #{i_board_type} ORDER BY i_board DESC LIMIT 3,5;
SELECT i_board_type, type_title, board_hit FROM t_board_type ORDER BY board_hit DESC;

select.if: SELECT a.i_board, a.i_board_type, a.board_nm, a.board_ctnt, a.board_favorite, a.board_hit, a.secret, a.r_dt, b.i_user, b.user_nm, (SELECT t_board_type.type_title FROM t_board_type WHERE t_board_type.i_board_type = a.i_board_type) AS type_title, (SELECT count(t_favorite.i_user) FROM t_favorite WHERE t_favorite.i_board = a.i_board) AS favorite, (SELECT count(board_cmt.i_cmt) FROM board_cmt WHERE a.i_board = board_cmt.i_board) AS cmt FROM t_board a left JOIN everyuser b ON a.i_user = b.i_user WHERE b.i_user = #{i_user} order by i_board desc;

SELECT a.i_cmt, a.i_board, a.i_user, b.i_board, b.i_board_type, b.board_nm, b.board_ctnt, b.board_favorite, b.secret, b.r_dt, b.board_hit, (SELECT t_board_type.type_title FROM t_board_type WHERE t_board_type.i_board_type = b.i_board_type) AS type_title, (SELECT count(board_cmt.i_cmt) FROM board_cmt WHERE a.i_board = board_cmt.i_board) AS cmt, (SELECT count(t_favorite.i_user) FROM t_favorite WHERE t_favorite.i_board = a.i_board) AS favorite FROM board_cmt a RIGHT JOIN t_board b ON a.i_board = b.i_board WHERE a.i_user = #{i_user} order by i_cmt desc;

SELECT i_board, i_board_type, i_user, board_nm, board_ctnt, board_favorite, secret, r_dt, board_hit, (SELECT everyuser.user_nm FROM everyuser WHERE everyuser.i_user = t_board.i_user) AS user_nm, (SELECT count(t_favorite.i_user) FROM t_favorite WHERE t_favorite.i_board = t_board.i_board) AS favorite, (SELECT count(board_cmt.i_cmt) FROM board_cmt WHERE t_board.i_board = board_cmt.i_board) AS cmt, (SELECT t_board_type.type_title FROM t_board_type WHERE t_board.i_board_type = t_board_type.i_board_type) AS type_title FROM t_board ORDER BY board_hit DESC;

SELECT i_board, i_board_type, i_user, board_nm, board_ctnt, board_favorite, secret, r_dt, board_hit, (SELECT everyuser.user_nm FROM everyuser WHERE everyuser.i_user = t_board.i_user) AS user_nm, (SELECT count(t_favorite.i_user) FROM t_favorite WHERE t_favorite.i_board = t_board.i_board) AS favorite, (SELECT count(board_cmt.i_cmt) FROM board_cmt WHERE t_board.i_board = board_cmt.i_board) AS cmt, (SELECT t_board_type.type_title FROM t_board_type WHERE t_board.i_board_type = t_board_type.i_board_type) AS type_title FROM t_board ORDER BY cmt DESC;

mapper.select: SELECT a.i_board, a.i_board_type, a.i_user, a.board_nm, a.board_ctnt, a.board_favorite, a.secret, a.board_hit, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, a.r_dt, NOW()) AS r_dt, (SELECT everyuser.user_nm FROM everyuser WHERE everyuser.i_user = a.i_user) AS user_nm, (SELECT count(t_favorite.i_user) FROM t_favorite WHERE t_favorite.i_board = a.i_board) AS favorite, (SELECT count(board_cmt.i_cmt) FROM board_cmt WHERE a.i_board = board_cmt.i_board) AS cmt FROM t_board a WHERE board_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{board_nm}, '%') ORDER BY i_board DESC;
